name: IOBluetoothSDPServiceAttribute
desc: IOBluetoothSDPServiceAttribute represents a single SDP service attribute.

items.name: init!(id: BluetoothSDPServiceAttributeID, attributeElement: IOBluetoothSDPDataElement!)
items.desc: Initializes a new service attribute with the given ID and data element.

items.name: init!(id: BluetoothSDPServiceAttributeID, attributeElementValue: NSObject!)
items.desc: Initializes a new service attribute with the given ID and element value.

items.name: func getID() -> BluetoothSDPServiceAttributeID
items.desc: Returns the attribute ID for the target service attribute.

items.name: func getDataElement() -> IOBluetoothSDPDataElement!
items.desc: Returns the data element for the target service attribute.

items.name: func getIDDataElement() -> IOBluetoothSDPDataElement!
items.desc: Returns the data element representing the attribute ID for the target service attribute.

items.name: class func withID(BluetoothSDPServiceAttributeID, attributeElement: IOBluetoothSDPDataElement!) -> Self!
items.desc: Creates a new service attribute with the given ID and data element.

items.name: class func withID(BluetoothSDPServiceAttributeID, attributeElementValue: NSObject!) -> Self!
items.desc: Creates a new service attribute with the given ID and element value.
